document_data.name: Champagne du le Stomp
document_data.mainbody: '''Champagne du le Stomp''' was a rare vintage of sparkling [[wine]] produced and distributed by the [[Wizard of Wines]] winery in [[Barovia]].
document_data.Description: The drink was a quality and rare vintage, known for its rich taste.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], [[Arik Lorensk]] at the [[Blood on the Vine Tavern]] in the village of [[Barovia]] sought bottles of Champagne du le Stomp, the rarest and most precious vintage of the time. Several bottles of the wine were recovered and gifted to Arik by adventurers from [[Neverwinter]].
